# dialog

## show

<w-dialog open></w-dialog>

```html
<w-dialog open></w-dialog>
```

## showModal

```html
<w-dialog id="dialog"></w-dialog>
<script>
    document.querySelector('#dialog').showModal()
</script>
```

## close

```html
<w-dialog id="dialog"></w-dialog>
<script>
    document.querySelector('#dialog').close()
</script>
```
